channel.title: Walking on Air with Betsy and Sal
channel.description: What do women talk about when they go walking? Talk radio co-hosts Betsy Brint and Sally Higginson chat with callers about life with laughter and irreverence.

channel.itunes:subtitle: What do women talk about when they go walking? Radio co-hosts Betsy Brint and Sally Higginson chat with callers about life with laughter and irreverence.

item.title: 2011-07-02 - Hour 1
item.description: Sally participates in the Big Foot Triathlon and recalls the most memorable part - the "Tri-Candy" AKA really cute athletes. Movie review: Cars II and Bad Teacher. Adventure traveller Mitch Kanter on his recent trip hiking the Inca Trail.

item.title: Ma and Pa Higgs
item.description: Sally-Bob and Tim-Bob go a-huntin for pumpkins... in suburbia... with a wheel barrow. Chris Freytag on exercising through chemo-therapy. Author Kody Keplinger joins the Gals to talk about her teen novel, "The Duff."

item.title: The Man Chair and The Saddle
item.description: Everyone needs a "man-chair." Betsy and Sal, along with Movie Man Matt Swan, review the movie "Secretariet." Nancy Siler is back to chat about National Cake Decorating Month.

item.title: Chesus Loves You
item.description: What do you do when you see Jesus in your grilled cheese? Eat the half that is Jesus free and pray to the other half. Hand warming gloves for perpetually cold Betsy. "Love That Dog" author and Bo Obama's trainer on positive dog training.

item.title: Numbers and Nos
item.description: Sal's fantasy retirement number is $12 million. Betsy's fantasy outside temperature is 82 degrees. What's your number? Do you suffer from TED... always late? The power of NO! And fall means homecoming stories.

item.title: Who We Are
item.description: What do women talk about when they go walking? Radio co-hosts Betsy Brint and Sally Higginson talk with each other and with call-in guests about all the things in their lives that make them laugh, make them angry, and make them into typical middle-aged gals.
item.itunes:author: Betsy and Sal
item.itunes:subtitle: What do women talk about when they go walking? Radio co-hosts Betsy Brint and Sally Higginson talk with each other and with call-in guests about things in their lives that make them laugh or cry and make them into typical middle-aged gals.
item.itunes:summary: What do women talk about when they go walking? Radio co-hosts Betsy Brint and Sally Higginson talk with each other and with call-in guests about all the things in their lives that make them laugh, make them angry, and make them into typical middle-aged gals.
